entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections late this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending before morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 before morning. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023
